args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". As Bondi takes over Justice Dept., official pledges no revenge on FBI agents Pam Bondi was sworn in as the nation’s 87th attorney general Wednesday, inheriting a Justice Department roiled by recent staffing shake-ups and under pressure from President Donald Trump to remake a federal law enforcement apparatus he has denounced as “weaponized” against conservatives. She took the oath of office just hours after the department’s interim leaders sought to assure thousands of FBI agents who had worked on cases tied to the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol that they were not in imminent danger of being purged.
